ParameterArray.Name: GraftSurfaceVertexPositions
ParameterArray.Description: Stores the surface positions of the groom's internal graft surface vertices, relative to groom's distribution surface

Parameter.Name: FlipGraftSurfaceNormals
Parameter.Description: An internal parameter set during fitting which determines if the graft surface was flipped horizontally during fitting and thus needs its normals to be flipped as well

Parameter.Name: ScaleFactor
Parameter.Description: Scaling applied to the loaded groom's distance parameters

Parameter.Name: ParamTypesList
Parameter.Description: List of parameters with their types

Parameter.Name: Graph
Parameter.Description: Serialized groom graph when it is not referenced through a file

Parameter.Name: Enable
Parameter.Description: When on, the hair generated by the groom will be duplicated and mirrored. Useful for eyelashes and eyebrows.

Parameter.Name: Axis
Parameter.Description: When mirroring is enabled specifies the object-space axis of the mirror plane

Parameter.Name: Randomize
Parameter.Description: Changes the random seed of the mirrored groom to make it distinct from the original groom
